scripts.builddir:create: mkdir -p build/instant/sequential/config && mkdir -p build/instant/mixedpudo/config && mkdir -p build/sameday/directpudo/config
scripts.prepdocker:instant:sequential: cp apps/instant-sequential/target/*.jar build/instant/sequential && cp -r apps/instant-sequential/src/main/docker/* build/instant/sequential && cp apps/instant-sequential/src/main/resources/*.* build/instant/sequential/config/
scripts.prepdocker:instant:mixedpudo: cp apps/instant-mixedpudo/target/*.jar build/instant/mixedpudo && cp -r apps/instant-mixedpudo/src/main/docker/* build/instant/mixedpudo && cp apps/instant-mixedpudo/src/main/resources/*.* build/instant/mixedpudo/config/
scripts.prepdocker:sameday:directpudo: cp apps/sameday-directpudo/target/*.jar build/sameday/directpudo && cp -r apps/sameday-directpudo/src/main/docker/* build/sameday/directpudo && cp apps/sameday-directpudo/src/main/resources/*.* build/sameday/directpudo/config/
scripts.build: yarn builddir:reset && yarn mvn:package && yarn prepdocker:instant:sequential && yarn prepdocker:sameday:directpudo
